effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a very high chance to lash out with a Hateful Strike, inflicting 200,818 Physical damage to an enemy and healing you for 11,767. These effects are increased by 100% while you are below 35% health.

Use: Unleash your inner tempest to gain 10,497 Strength for 15 sec. Your next 3 abilities cause a lightning blast dealing 385,719 Nature damage to your primary target. Damage increased by 100% with each subsequent blast. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.
